data.name: Titanfall™ 2: Northstar Prime
data.detailed_description: Stand out on the Frontier in Titanfall 2 with Northstar Prime. This all new chassis changes the shape of the Northstar Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. Become one with your new Northstar Prime to crush your enemies in style!
data.about_the_game: Stand out on the Frontier in Titanfall 2 with Northstar Prime. This all new chassis changes the shape of the Northstar Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. Become one with your new Northstar Prime to crush your enemies in style!
data.short_description: Get Northstar Prime today to give your Northstar a new look with an exclusive chassis, unique sound effects and a new execution.
